name: ids-enterprise-wc
description: The Web Component version of the IDS Enterprise component library

scripts.build:dist: npx rimraf build/dist/development && npx tsc && npx webpack --config ./webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:dist:prod: npx rimraf build/dist/production && npx tsc && npx webpack --config ./webpack.config.prod.js --mode production
scripts.build:coverage: npx rimraf build/dist/development && node --max-old-space-size=16384 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --config ./webpack.config.dev.js --env coverage
scripts.build:stats: npx rimraf build/dist/production && npx webpack --config ./webpack.config.dist.js --mode production
scripts.start: npx rimraf build/development && node --max-old-space-size=16384 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack serve --live-reload --open --config ./webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.lint: npx eslint src test && npx stylelint src/**/**/*.scss --config .stylelintrc.json && npm run mdlint && npx htmlhint 'src/**/*.html'
scripts.publish:dry-run: npm run build:dist:prod && cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/production/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/production && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/production && cd build/dist/production && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build:dist:prod && cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/production/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/production && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/production && cd build/dist/production && npm publish
scripts.publish:debug: npm run build:dist && cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/production/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/production && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/production && cd build/dist/production && npm publish
scripts.test:ci: node --max-old-space-size=16384 `which npm` run test:ui && node --max-old-space-size=16384 `which npm` run test:percy
scripts.test:percy:local: npx percy exec -- npm run test:percy

author: Infor Design
